'''''Five Blades Return to Wangshan''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Wangshan Swordsman's Inscriptions]]."
